title: Android tablets and foldables might see more helpful Play Store search results soon
content:
Android on tablets and other large-screen devices hasn’t been a great experience for a long time, but Google is slowly trying to change that. The recent Android 12L update (also called Android 12.1) focused on interface improvements for tablets and folding phones, and now the Google Play Store is introducing a few changes to help

The post Android tablets and foldables might see more helpful Play Store search results soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google will roll out ranking algorithm changes on the Play Store soon, with a focus on finding apps optimized for tablets/foldable devices.
